p: Thus, our results demonstrate that DNA repair activity is increased in malignant compared to benign tumors. The same trend was also established for the tumor-adjacent pathologically normal tissues. These two evidences highlight the link between tumor progression and increased level of DNA repair and are consistent with the previous literature data on DNA repair in thyroid tumors [ 24, 79]. In agreement with that, the increased level of DNA damage marker 8-oxo-dG had been previously reported for thyroid tumors [ 80]. The same trend was also observed for another reactive oxygen marker, cytoplasmic 4-HNE, which characterizes lipid peroxidation level [ 80].
